title: Golem Foundry Adventure #14
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Foundry Workshop
rooms.description: A vast workshop filled with the smell of molten metal and ozone. Half-finished golems stand frozen in various poses. Arcane runes glow faintly on the walls. Workbenches are cluttered with tools, gears, and crystalline power cores. A massive forge burns in the corner, casting dancing shadows across the stone floor.

items.name: master workbench
items.description: A large workbench covered in blueprints, tools, and golem components

items.name: bronze workshop key
items.description: A key shaped like a gear, warm to the touch

items.name: tool cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with multiple drawers containing various artificer's tools

items.name: artificer's workshop log
items.description: A leather-bound journal with notes about golem construction
items.text: Workshop Log - Master Artificer Theron: Today I completed Golem Model 742, my finest work yet. The activation sequence requires the command word, the power source location, and the creator's name. Only then will the guardian golem awaken and open the vault.

items.name: glowing activation crystal
items.description: A crystalline power core pulsing with magical energy

items.name: reinforced iron chest
items.description: A heavy chest secured with a bronze lock mechanism

items.name: golem operation manual
items.description: A technical manual with detailed instructions
items.text: GOLEM OPERATION MANUAL: Command Word: AWAKEN. All golems draw power from the Core Furnace in the heart of the foundry. Emergency protocols: If trapped, activate the guardian golem to access the vault exit.

items.name: massive arcane forge
items.description: A forge burning with magical flames, runes carved into its stone base
items.text: Forge inscription: 'Built by Master Artificer Theron, creator of the eternal guardians.'

items.name: heavy workshop door
items.description: A reinforced door leading to the foundry archives

rooms.name: Foundry Archives
rooms.description: A dimly lit chamber lined with shelves containing scrolls, blueprints, and crystalline data storage devices. Dust motes float in beams of light from enchanted lanterns. A large stone golem stands motionless in the center of the room, its eyes dark and lifeless. Ancient diagrams cover the walls, showing various golem designs.

items.name: blueprint storage rack
items.description: A wooden rack holding rolled-up technical drawings

items.name: guardian golem blueprint
items.description: A detailed schematic of the guardian golem model
items.text: GUARDIAN GOLEM - MODEL 742: Activation requires crystal insertion into chest cavity. Voice command: AWAKEN. Purpose: Vault security and emergency evacuation. Power Source: Core Furnace.

items.name: archive shelves
items.description: Tall shelves packed with scrolls and ancient records

items.name: master artificer record
items.description: An official document sealed with a wax stamp
items.text: FOUNDRY MASTER RECORD: This facility was established by Master Artificer Theron in the year 1247. All golems created here bear his mark. The vault contains the most valuable creations and the only exit from the sealed foundry.

items.name: dormant guardian golem
items.description: A massive stone golem standing perfectly still, with a crystal socket visible in its chest
items.text: The golem's chest has an empty socket shaped for a power crystal. Runes on its forehead read: 'Model 742 - Guardian Protocol Active.'

items.name: research desk
items.description: A desk covered in notes and experimental data

items.name: activation procedure notes
items.description: Handwritten notes about golem activation
items.text: ACTIVATION NOTES: To activate guardian golem - insert crystal, speak command word AWAKEN, then answer security questions. Questions verify: command word, power source, and creator identity.

items.name: sealed vault entrance
items.description: A massive door with a magical lock that responds to voice commands. Three questions are inscribed on a brass plate.

password_questions.question: What is the golem command word?
password_questions.hint: Check the golem operation manual and activation notes

password_questions.question: Where do golems draw their power?
password_questions.hint: The operation manual mentions the power source

password_questions.question: Who created the guardian golems?
password_questions.hint: Look at the forge inscription and master records

rooms.name: Master Vault Chamber
rooms.description: You have reached the heart of the foundry! The vault chamber is filled with completed golems of incredible craftsmanship - warriors, servants, and guardians, all standing in perfect rows. In the center, a pedestal holds a magnificent golden golem, the masterwork of the foundry. Beyond it, a shimmering portal of light leads to freedom.

items.name: masterwork golden golem
items.description: A breathtaking golem crafted from pure gold, inlaid with precious gems and glowing runes
items.text: Inscription on base: 'The Eternal Guardian - Masterwork of Theron, greatest of all artificers. May it protect the foundry for all time.'

items.name: rows of completed golems
items.description: Dozens of perfectly crafted golems standing in formation, awaiting activation

items.name: shimmering exit portal
items.description: A magical portal leading out of the sealed foundry, glowing with arcane energy

rooms.win_message: You have successfully navigated the Golem Foundry and reached the master vault! The guardian golem you activated bows respectfully as you approach the exit portal. The golden masterwork golem's eyes glow briefly in acknowledgment of your achievement. You step through the portal and emerge outside the foundry, free at last. The secrets of golem creation are yours to remember. You win!
